product_name: ReviveX Air Dry Water Repellent Spray - 5 oz.
long_description: ReviveX Air Dry Water Repellent spray is a high performance formula designed to create instant water repellency on outerwear, footwear and gear. Ideal for all types of breathable garments including those made with Gore-Tex(R) fabric, eVENT(R) and other breathable membranes. Easy to use, just spray on and allow to air dry; no heat required. Also works on synthetic insulated garments, skiwear, leather and fabric footwear, tents, packs and outdoor gear.
short_description: ReviveX Air Dry Water Repellent spray is a high performance formula designed to create instant water repellency on outerwear, footwear and gear.
